name: Lisa Phillips
text: OMG received a card in mail for a free 11 inch pizza our first time trying it out Delicious the best so far and a very delightful salad. They have inside seating and outside. Online ordering curbside pick up. Try it we we be going back.

name: Haley Smith
text: Worst experience ever. We  ventured out on Halloween and went to Blaze since we received a coupon in the mail for a free 11’. We had never been there before and I told the First Lady we encounter that. She was trying to explain the process …More

name: Courtney Koonce
text: One of my favorite places to get pizza in Conway! It's reasonably priced, fast, & delicious. I love that you can make your own pizza & they have amazing toppings to choose from.

name: Amanda Mcnolty
text: Employees were friendly and quick.  Pretty good Vegan pizza.

name: Brett Stone
text: Great pizza, great price, and lots of veggie toppings make Blaze a fantastic place. The only thing missing to pair up with the pizza is some great beer. You guys should partner with Lost Forty or some other microbrewery and get some of their beer on tap. That would bump my rating to five stars.

name: Yeshuah is King of Kings
text: My brother ordered me my first Blaze pizza last night. It had ghost pepper meatballs, scorpion pepper cole slaw, and a cayenne sauce... It was like Blaze read my diary, burned it, then made a pizza with it!! It was the best pizza I've had! …More

name: LJ Bryant
text: Great staff. Great food. Great location.  Quick service.

name: Beth Webster
text: Service was super fast and friendly and the pizza was delicious.

name: Rebekah Bryant

name: Christopher Dunn
text: Omg,,wut an awesome place,,pizza was so so good

name: Aaron Rowlett
text: The service and food is good, albeit a bit pricey. I like that you can build your own pizza right there on the spot. The only downside and a big one is that for some reason every time me and my family eat here, we always get stomach pains …More

name: Sandra Milam
text:
The only pizza place that will work with someone who has food.allergies.
The pizza is absolutely delicious. .....and I love the atmosphere. Everyone is so friendly.

name: Matt Siegfried
text: Staff wasn’t overly helpful and definitely not friendly.  Lady taking the order acted like we know what to do, even though she was told it was our first time.  The cook (long brown braided pony tail, with tattoos on his arm) never told us …More

name: elanor davis
text: So good. Fast. Pretty inexpensive. We had vegan version and all they are missing is an eggless crust. But the staff was gracious about all of our questions!

name: Paul
text: I really like the crust, but I didn't think I ordered an arugula pizza. I will try the meat lovers next time, and that might add another star. Staff was helpful for a newbie. Don't like the dark industrial decor.

name: fred dunavant
text:
I like a lot of stuff on my pizza. The crust was burned each time I got one. I like the concept; but not burned crust. I haven't been back in quite a while.
I have found Marcos pizza on Dave Ward to be very good and consistent.

name: Allison Jones
text: You get to make your own pizza! Enough said. The toppings are amazing and the pizza turns out so good, with their brick oven. There are so many options, everyone is sure to be happy in some way or another. I highly recommend banana peppers! Go make yourself your dream pizza and enjoy a filling dinner.

name: Stephen Davis
text: First time here. Super friendly staff, helpful, pizza was made quick and we were eating within 10 minutes of walking in the building. Will be back!

name: Nathan House
text: I love Blaze Pizza.  Their Blood Orange Lemonade is worth the price alone!

name: Ash Nine
text: Blaze is my favorite place to eat at the moment. It's a build your own brick oven pizza, and boy is it worth it. They've got 4 sauces, a ton of cheeses, so many meats, and a plethora of veggies. They also carry other crust options, like a …More

name: Carol King Kennard
text: Food was great!! It was our first time to visit, so there was a little bit of a learning curve for us. Very cool concept of designing your own pizza. We chose to order off the signature pizza menu instead, because the workers were a little …More

name: Amanda Andrews
text: Love Blaze Pizza! Delicious fire oven taste without the long wait! The build your own option can't be beat!

name: Josh B
text: Always good pizza, and fast service. I'm a basic toppings guy but they have plenty to offer for all tastes. Kids love it as well.

name: Gabrielle Harvey
text: If your pizza tastes bad, that's your fault. It's a build your own pizza place!

text: I wasn't offered a receipt and didn't think anything of it till later, which kind of sucks because I can't add it to my account. Also the people weren't very friendly, but they never are. Food was amazing as always, though, and I was glad …More

text: They had me at make your own. Sauces, cheeses and so many fresh toppings. Fresh basil and pesto drizzle! Melty, crispy and so yummy. Plenty of other options.

text: Blaze Pizza is my favorite place to eat in Conway. The food is good, fresh, and affordable, and the service has always been top notch.  Gabby, in particular, has always been super and friendly. text: Blaze pizza had a wonderful environment and satisfying food. They have both signature and build your own pizzas, so there are many options. The price is cheap for the quality of the food. There are many ingredients and they are all fresh …More

text:
Reminds me of a little Italian family restaurant, literally a walk-in closet, on the street level of thier home in Wiesbaden,GR.
Not in the since of size, but the taste & quality of having the choices availability and speediness of a modern Stone Oven in a restaurant that gives what you want.
